#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#define nik  long long int
inline nik ashu()
{
nik n=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0'||c>'9')c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0'&&c<='9')n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main() 
{
	nik t=ashu();
	while(t--)
	{
		nik n=ashu();
		nik i,sum=1;
		for( i=2 ; i * i <= n; i++ )
		{
			if( n % i  == 0 )
			{
			  sum+=i;
			  if( i * i != n)
			  sum+=(n/i);
			}
		/*	if(i*i==n)
			  sum-=i;*/
		}
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
